title: Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Vietnamese & 4 More Languages
summary: This major localization release brings Frames for macOS to even more users worldwide, adding support for eight new languages while refining translations across all existing languages.

sections.content: Frames for macOS now supports Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Indonesian, Hong Kong Chinese, and Greek. Each translation maintains consistency with the iOS app while adapting to macOS-specific interface elements and metadata reintegration workflows.

sections.alt: Frames macOS app with multilingual support including Nordic and Asian languages

improvements: Added Hong Kong Chinese with region-specific preferences
Refined all existing translations for improved clarity
